text:
e="preserve">Christopher Ranville Cramer (3 January 1948 – 16 January 2021) was a British news journalist and executive. During his career, he was worked for the BBC and was an executive at CNN International. He worked as a consultant for "The Wall Street Journal". He was born in Portsmouth, England.
Cramer died of cancer on 16 January 2021 at age 73.
